# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal for Laboratory Mill 3100s

**Reference Number:** WS4170995817-Doc4171055589

**Publication Date:** August 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 20, 2023 2:00 PM EDT

**Amendment:** This is an unsolicited amendment to the original tender. Please disregard the initial closing time specified on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys.

**Notice:** This is a request for proposals (RFP) to provide six (6) new Perten Laboratory Mill 3100s with selected accessories to the Canadian Grain Commission (CGC). The contract also includes an option to purchase up to eight (8) additional units from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2026.

**Contract Information:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Regions of Delivery:**

* **Manitoba**
* **Quebec (except NCR)**
* **British Columbia**
* **Ontario (except NCR)**

**Contracting Entity and End-User Entities:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Canadian Grain Commission (CGC)

**Contact Information:**

* **Contact Name:** Mohamed Shawky Elgallab (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [mohamedshawky.elgallab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mohamedshawky.elgallab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

To respond to this RFP, submit all required supporting documentation and bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform by September 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. The notice for this tender can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17309382?extsite=MTczMDkzODJfQU4w
